22bet brand is growing up and extending our African team. Do you have experience and iGaming and traffic?
Join us!

What will you do:
Managing advertising campaigns of push, native, banner, popunder formats (Propellerads, Taboola, Mgid, Exoclick, TJ, Sportradar, etc.) both independently and with the use of contractors/agencies.
Creating the text part of creatives and providing briefs for the graphic design part to in-house designers.
Working with trackers like Binom, Google Analytics, and other analytics tools.
Familiarity with new services, DSPs, MMPs, trackers, etc.
Structured approach to work, analyzing data, and drawing conclusions based on it.

What do you have:
Minimum 1 year of experience in gambling as a traffic manager.
Sufficient English proficiency for communication with partners and colleagues.
Experience with Facebook Ads.
High level of perseverance (sometimes there will be a need to handle numerous links, load, and analyze statistics for 100+ banners).
Desire to learn new things (constant implementation of new technologies and testing various services).

What we can offer:
Full remote work.
Career growth opportunities.
In-house designers, layout designers, programmers, all the infrastructure for work and implementation of ideas.
@Kate_recruiting

We are actively seeking top professionals in the AAA gaming industry to join our team and contribute to this groundbreaking project.

Specifically, we're looking for individuals to fill the following key Talent Acquisition Specialist role.

Farcana is a free-to-play 3rd-person PC arena shooter built on Unreal Engine 5 & powered by a Web3 economy, coming to PC.

Requirements:
üí°2-4 years of experience as a Recruiter or Talent Acquisition Specialist
üí°Experience in IT, Gamedev, Fintech, Web3 or AI hiring,
üí°Solid knowledge of Boolean / X-Ray search and filters
üí°Experience with different recruitment ATS
üí°Ability to create or improve recruitment pipelines
üí°Experience in international recruitment in different time zones
üí°Experience in hiring and onboarding a distributed remote team
üí°English B2+
Nice to have:
üí°Experience in Web3 hiring
üí°Experience in PC Gamedev

Full job description on the careers page of our website: https://lnkd.in/dvX3W35s
